short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks destracting sites and remindes you to get back to work.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing "Distractions Begone" - a powerful Chrome extension designed to help you eliminate distractions and boost your productivity. With this handy tool, you can effortlessly block websites that tend to steal your focus. Whenever you attempt to access a blocked site, "Distractions Begone" has a special surprise in store for you. It replaces the webpage with an amusing gif of the one and only Danny DeVito shaking his head disapprovingly, along with a friendly message encouraging you to take a break from the computer or engage in a different activity. Let "Distractions Begone" empower you to stay on track, manage your time effectively, and make the most out of your online experience. Install "Distractions Begone" today and wave goodbye to unproductive browsing habits!
